description:
The comedy manga centers around a super-powered girl named Hina and Nitta, a young member of the yakuza. Hina suddenly appears in Nitta's room and threatens him with her extraordinary powers. However, they end up living together.

(Source: Anime News Network)

title.romaji: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo!
title.english: KONOSUBA -God's blessing on this wonderful world!
title.native: この素晴らしい世界に祝福を！
title.userPreferred: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo!

title.english: The Disastrous Life of Saiki K.

title.native: 小林さんちのメイドラゴン
荒川アンダー ザ ブリッジ
這いよれ！ニャル子さん

title.english: Daily Lives of High School Boys

title.romaji: Kaguya-sama wa Kokurasetai: Tensaitachi no Renai Zunousen
title.native: かぐや様は告らせたい～天才たちの恋愛頭脳戦～
title.userPreferred: Kaguya-sama wa Kokurasetai: Tensaitachi no Renai Zunousen

episodes.title: This Is how You Have a Superpower Battle!
Three Heads Are Better Than One
And It's the Same Old Hina
A Man Thirsty for Blood, Violence, and Money
